name: Pressure Cooker Cream of Tomato Soup
author: Slimming Eats
ingredients:
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 1 carrot, finely chopped
- 2 cloves of garlic, crushed
- 250g tomatoes
- 2 400g tins of tomatoes
- 2 tbsp tomato puree
- 960ml of chicken or vegetable stock
- 1tsp honey
- Â½ cup (120ml) of cottage cheese 
- 1 tsp of mixed Italian Herbs
- salt and pepper
instructions:
- On the saute setting, fry off the onion, garlic and carrot.
- Add the reset of the ingredients except the cottage cheese.
- Cook on high pressure for 10 minutes with natural release
- Once the soup has cooled slightly, blend it with the cottage cheese
- Bring the soup back to a simmer and season with salt and pepper.
